reviews.title: Very nice pictures.. Pleasure to have this

reviews.title: Lock Screen
reviews.comment: Love the pictures, Da Vinci was the greatest. But you guys are missing the option for the lock screen wallpaper. Besides that, great app. Ah, you have a lot of pics, if you could change the way to navigate through the pics, to make it faster, thanks.
reviews.author: Rayners Est\303\251vez
